name: Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Combo - Full-Sized Ergonomic Keyboard with Wrist Rest, Phone Holder, Sleep Mode, Silent 2.4GHz Cordless Keyboard Mouse Combo for Computer, Laptop, PC, Mac, Windows -Trueque
short_description: BUILT FOR COMFORT - Ergonomic keyboard designed with a generous palm rest and tilt legs, offers a better typing position to reduce the pressure on your wrist. The wireless mouse provides total comfort with a perfect handshake angle, contoured grips and premium matte finish.

Idle for 15 mins, the keyboard will sleep, idle for 10 mins, the mouse will sleep, press any button or key to wake up. You can go for months without the hassle of changing the batteries. The keyboard needs 2 x AAA battery, the mouse needs 1 x AA battery. (Battery Not Included)

LESS NOISE, MORE FOCUS - Soft membrane keys for making typing quiet and smooth. You can now enjoy quiet and comfortable typing all day long. The wireless mouse feels just as clicky but makes 95% less noise. No more worry about disturbing others.

NO DELAY, ENJOY WIRELESS FREEDOM - Plug and play, only one USB receiver for both keyboard and mouse! Upgraded chips and 2.4GHz wireless technology provide a stable and reliable connection up to 33ft without any latency.

MULTI-FUNCTION & EFFICIENCY - This wireless keyboard mouse combo features 6 commonly used hotkeys that allow you to browse the webpage and access the calculator with one click. 6-button mouse with forward/backward functions will help you navigate the web faster and easier than ever before.

【USB-C COMPATIBILITY】 We provide an additional USB-C adapter with the combo, allowing you to easily connect the keyboard and mouse to devices such as Mac and other USB-C enabled devices. Enjoy seamless compatibility and hassle-free connectivity. Please note: The USB-C is not a receiver and cannot be used on its own, it is an adapter that needs to be plugged into a USB-A receiver in order to work. 【SIMPLE AND SLEEK DESIGN】 Our keyboard and mouse combo features a sleek and minimalist design, adding a touch of elegance to your workspace. The clean and professional appearance complements any office or home office environment.

【VERSATILE USAGE】 Perfect for office work, home office setups, and various computing needs, our combo works seamlessly with computers, laptops, Macs, and more (No Bluetooth.).
